LanguageData.CommandAddExistingSubpart_Description: Choose a part to add to this one's sub-parts.
LanguageData.CommandAddExistingSubpart_CouldNotFindPa: Could not find a compatible part to add.
LanguageData.Command_SetTargetLimb_Description: Choose what limb this will replace
LanguageData.CommandSplitOffSubpart_Description: Choose a part to remove from this one's subparts.
LanguageData.RecipeMakeForLimbDescription: Make {0} {1}. It will be installable on the following races: {2}.
LanguageData.CompIncludedChildParts_StatIncludedParts: When implanted it will also install theese:
LanguageData.ModuleHolder_Compatible_ReportText: The following modules can be installed in slots belonging to this bionic:
LanguageData.Bill_MedicalLimbAware_OnlyComplete: Only allow installation of compatible prostheses.
LanguageData.HediffHideModeSetting_Description: Choose when standard subparts should be hidden in the Health Overview tab. - Always: standard sub-parts will be always hidden - Never: standard sub-parts will be always visible - Clean: standard sub-parts will be hidden when there are no other hediffs on their part - Clean or modules: standard sub-parts will be hidden when there are no other hediffs on their part or they only have modules
LanguageData.RemoveAllFromSegmentSetting_Title: Remove all sub-parts from segment version
LanguageData.RemoveAllFromSegmentSetting_Description: Enabling this will remove and spawn all sub-parts after switching a prosthetic to Segment version.
LanguageData.HideModuleSlotsSetting_Description: When toggled on, module slots will not be visible in the health tab.
